original_table_html:
Wholesale strategy Wholesale marketing mix
Wholesale segmentation and targeting
Differentiation and service positioning 		Product and service assortment
Wholesale prices
Promotion
Distribution (location)
Create value for targeted wholesale customers
summary_markdown: This table outlines a wholesale strategy focused on creating value for targeted wholesale customers. The strategy encompasses two main areas: segmentation and targeting, and differentiation and service positioning. These strategic elements inform the wholesale marketing mix, which comprises product and service assortment, wholesale prices, promotion, and distribution, specifically location. The overarching goal is to leverage these marketing mix components to effectively serve and add value to chosen wholesale customer segments. The structure is hierarchical, with the overarching strategy guiding the tactical marketing mix elements, all aimed at the central objective of customer value creation.
